data.name: NeonCyber.exe
data.detailed_description:
Complete parkour levels by measuring your speed and score, the better your performance the more rewards you will earn. You can use a store to buy skills, upgrades and you can also buy skins for your character.

Leveled difficulty system - Start from beginner levels to become a true veteran.

Skill and upgrade system - Try different skills and upgrades when playing. Don't limit yourself to the monotonous.

Character customization - Buy skins for your character and show your potential.

Slow-Motion - Learn to control the time and complete the obstacles in your way.

Time and Score Counter - Get inspired and improve your performance with the time and score system.

Get achievements to collect - Complete levels and challenges to get achievements.
data.about_the_game:
Complete parkour levels by measuring your speed and score, the better your performance the more rewards you will earn. You can use a store to buy skills, upgrades and you can also buy skins for your character.

Leveled difficulty system - Start from beginner levels to become a true veteran.

Skill and upgrade system - Try different skills and upgrades when playing. Don't limit yourself to the monotonous.

Character customization - Buy skins for your character and show your potential.

Slow-Motion - Learn to control the time and complete the obstacles in your way.

Time and Score Counter - Get inspired and improve your performance with the time and score system.

Get achievements to collect - Complete levels and challenges to get achievements.
data.short_description: NeonCyber.exe is a 3D parkour platform game. Complete levels in the shortest time possible and score points to earn coins. You can use them to buy skills, upgrades and skins for your character.
data.supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4150
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Sapphire HD 7770
  • Storage: 354 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-9600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 354 MB available space
